AfterTalking: ^You better get your stuff all sorted, we're almost there!
Gerold: ^You're the one getting off at Fanville, aren't ya?
^Quite the nice town... I mean, this train has been passing there for the last 50 years, from what I've heard!
^Depends on how much I like it there...

c-0: ^Spectacular! A new home means a new life, so do enjoy it lots... eh...
c-1: ^No need to be negative, I'm sure you'll love it there, ...um-
g-0: ^No! It's a cool name for a cool guy!
^Perfect for a lady of my caliber!

c-3: ^Yes, a beautiful name for a beautiful lady!

g-1: ^I haven't told you right? The name's Gerold! Remember me as one of the best conductors across the lands!
^Anyways, do you already know anything about where you're heading?
^I heard the people there are an odd bunch.
^I've seen photos of some places. Seems there's lots of nature there.
^Nope! What's up with the name "Fanville" anyways?

c-4: ^You heard right! Always somethin' with those folk.
^From time to time I catch wind of an interesting story from there.
c-5: ^That's right! The town is real old school, no roads or cars. Just the dirt on your paws!
c-6: ^Beats me. Maybe if I were a bigger FAN of that place, I'd know!

g-2: ^We're almost there, so you outta go get your stuff ready.
